folder.name: ARCHIVE/DEV/Cost To Serve Notebooks DEV/CTS Run

source:
# This notebook aggregates the following monthly views to be used in further notebooks for cost applications:
1. Monthly Drops table (Table on trip, drop level by month)
2. Monthly Costs table (Table by Month, Depot, Cost UOM, FixVar by month) - sums up the total costs for:
    * Other Cost
    * Equipment Cost
    * Fuel Cost
    * Facility Cost
    * Non-Unionised Cost
    * Unionised Cost
    * Service Provider Cost
    * Revenue Cost
    * Linehaul Cost
3. Monthly Parcel Tracks
4. Monthly Linehaul activity

# WRITE abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/CTS_Results/

from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
import pandas as pd

#STOPS
parcel_track = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stlmstrack.parquet/", format='parquet')
parcel = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stparcel.parquet/", format='parquet')
waybill = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stwaybill.parquet/", format='parquet')
location = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stlocation.parquet/", format='parquet')
dispatch_segment = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdispatchsegment.parquet/", format='parquet')
del_pickup_cust = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdeliverypickupcustomer.parquet/", format='parquet')
load_parent = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stloadparent.parquet/", format='parquet')
load_child = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stloadchild.parquet/", format='parquet')

#STSAP
#dim_account = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_Account_Expose.parquet/", format='parquet') #FILE WAS REMOVED 2023-09
dim_accountv2 = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/FINANCE/stchartofaccounts.parquet/", format='parquet')
#dim_dates = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_DATES.parquet/", format='parquet')
#dim_group = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_GROUP_Expose.parquet/", format='parquet')
trans_summary = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/FINANCE/sttransactionssummary.parquet/", format='parquet')

#CTS Inputs
dim_skippedreasoninclude = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_SkippedReasonIncludeExclude.parquet/", format='parquet')
DIM_CTS_I_GLMapDefault = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_CTS_I_GLMapDefault.parquet/", format='parquet')
DIM_CTS_I_PARAM_Ranges = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_CTS_I_PARAM_Ranges.parquet/", format='parquet')

#TMS - specifically for linehaul data
parcel_weights = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stlmsparcelweights.parquet/", format='parquet')
stbooking = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stbooking.parquet/", format='parquet')
sttrip = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/sttrip.parquet/", format='parquet')
stopsroute = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stopsroute.parquet/", format='parquet')
stparentroute = spark.read.load("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stparentroute.parquet/", format='parquet')

#STOPS
parcel_track.createOrReplaceTempView("parcel_track")
parcel.createOrReplaceTempView("parcel")
waybill.createOrReplaceTempView("waybill")
location.createOrReplaceTempView("location")
dispatch_segment.createOrReplaceTempView("dispatch_segment")
del_pickup_cust.createOrReplaceTempView("del_pickup_cust")
load_parent.createOrReplaceTempView("load_parent")
load_child.createOrReplaceTempView("load_child")

#STSAP
#dim_account.createOrReplaceTempView("dim_account") #FILE WAS REMOVED 2023-09
dim_accountv2.createOrReplaceTempView("dim_accountv2")
#dim_dates.createOrReplaceTempView("dim_dates")
#dim_group.createOrReplaceTempView("dim_group")
trans_summary.createOrReplaceTempView("trans_summary")

#CTS Inputs
dim_skippedreasoninclude.createOrReplaceTempView("dim_skippedreasoninclude")
DIM_CTS_I_GLMapDefault.createOrReplaceTempView("DIM_CTS_I_GLMapDefault")
DIM_CTS_I_PARAM_Ranges.createOrReplaceTempView("DIM_CTS_I_PARAM_Ranges")

#TMS
parcel_weights.createOrReplaceTempView("parcel_weights")
stbooking.createOrReplaceTempView("stbooking")
sttrip.createOrReplaceTempView("sttrip")
stopsroute.createOrReplaceTempView("stopsroute")
stparentroute.createOrReplaceTempView("stparentroute")

def list_dataframes():
    from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
    return [k for (k, v) in globals().items() if isinstance(v, DataFrame)]

list_dataframes()

#Remember to exclude fastway(FL.lms_location_locationtypeid = 6 AND P.lms_parcel_customerbarcode is null) .Temporary = (FL.[lms_location_description] like '%(fw)%' AND P.lms_parcel_customerbarcode is null)

f_drops = spark.sql("""

with drops as (
SELECT  orv_dispatchsegment_id
	  ,LP.lms_loadparent_parentloadid
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_site
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_startinglat
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_startinglng
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_distance
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_duration
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_estdepdate
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_estarrdate
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_fromdelid
	  ,fc.lms_customer_id as lms_from_customer_id
	  ,fc.orv_customer_name as orv_from_customer_name
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_todelid
	  ,tc.lms_customer_id as lms_to_customer_id
      ,tc.orv_customer_name as orv_to_customer_name
	  ,CAST(6371 as float) * 2 * ASIN(SQRT(POWER(SIN(RADIANS(LP.orv_dispatch_startinglat - dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_tolat) / 2), 2) + COS(RADIANS(dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_tolat)) * COS(RADIANS(LP.orv_dispatch_startinglat)) * POWER(SIN(RADIANS(LP.orv_dispatch_startinglng - dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_tolng) / 2), 2))) AS StemDistance
	  ,tc0.orv_delivery_status as tc_orv_delivery_status
	  ,tc0.lms_waybill_id as tc_lms_waybill_id
	  ,tc0.orv_delivery_skipreason as tc_orv_delivery_skipreason
	  ,orv_dispatchsegment_distance
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_duration
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_did
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_tollcost
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_fuelcost
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_inscost
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_labourcost
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_maintcost
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_cpicost
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_vehicleclass
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_fromlat
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_fromlng
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_tolat
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_tolng
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_departuredate
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_arrivaldate
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_debriefeddate
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_optimized
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_segmentorder
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_customized
      ,orv_dispatchsegment_parcelct
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_vehicletype
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_triptype
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_status
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_startodo
	  ,LP.orv_dispatch_stopodo
	  ,SRE.IncludeCosting
      ,SRE.IncludeTheoretical
	  ,tc0.NUM_PARCELS
	  ,LAG(orv_dispatchsegment_arrivaldate,1) OVER (PARTITION BY orv_dispatchsegment_did ORDER BY orv_dispatchsegment_arrivaldate) AS DROP_START
	  ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY  orv_dispatchsegment_did ORDER BY orv_dispatchsegment_departuredate) AS seq
  FROM (SELECT *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY orv_dispatchsegment_did,COALESCE(orv_dispatchsegment_fromdelid,'') ORDER BY orv_dispatchsegment_customized desc) AS RN FROM dispatch_segment
		--WHERE orv_dispatchsegment_did IN (545891,522846) --One normal & one skipped trip
		--WHERE orv_dispatchsegment_did IN (549595,551082,550607,550205)
		) dseg --Select the drop where customized = 1 otherwise use other drop value
	LEFT JOIN ( --get LMS customer ID from waybill table
			SELECT
		orv_delivery_did
		,orv_delivery_id
		,MAX(lms_waybill_delivercustid) AS lms_waybill_delivercustid
		,MAX(orv_delivery_orderid) AS orv_delivery_orderid
		,MAX(orv_delivery_status) AS orv_delivery_status
		,MAX(lms_waybill_id) as lms_waybill_id
		FROM waybill
		GROUP BY orv_delivery_did
		,orv_delivery_id
	) fc0 ON dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_did = fc0.orv_delivery_did AND dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_fromdelid = fc0.orv_delivery_id
		LEFT JOIN ( --get LMS customer ID from waybill table
			SELECT
		orv_delivery_did
		,orv_delivery_id
		,MAX(lms_waybill_delivercustid) AS lms_waybill_delivercustid
		,MAX(orv_delivery_orderid) AS orv_delivery_orderid
		,MAX(orv_delivery_status) AS orv_delivery_status
		,MAX(lms_waybill_id) as lms_waybill_id
		,MAX(orv_delivery_skipreason) as orv_delivery_skipreason
		,MAX(NUM_PARCELS) AS NUM_PARCELS
		FROM waybill R
		LEFT JOIN (
				SELECT
		lms_parcel_waybillid
		,COUNT(lms_parcel_id) AS NUM_PARCELS
		FROM parcel
		GROUP BY lms_parcel_waybillid
		) PC ON R.lms_waybill_id = PC.lms_parcel_waybillid
		GROUP BY orv_delivery_did
		,orv_delivery_id
	) tc0 ON dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_did = tc0.orv_delivery_did AND dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_todelid = tc0.orv_delivery_id

  LEFT JOIN del_pickup_cust fc on fc0.lms_waybill_delivercustid = fc.lms_customer_id
  LEFT JOIN del_pickup_cust tc on tc0.lms_waybill_delivercustid = tc.lms_customer_id
  LEFT JOIN load_parent LP ON dseg.orv_dispatchsegment_did = LP.orv_dispatch_id
  LEFT JOIN dim_skippedreasoninclude SRE ON tc0.orv_delivery_status = SRE.DispatchStatus AND COALESCE(tc0.orv_delivery_skipreason,'') = COALESCE(SRE.DeliveryReason,'')
 WHERE RN = 1
 AND last_day(LP.orv_dispatch_estdepdate) >= '""" + MonthToRun + """'
 AND LP.orv_dispatch_startinglat <> 0
 AND LP.orv_dispatch_startinglng <> 0
 )


SELECT
orv_dispatch_estdepdate AS TRIP_START
,orv_dispatch_estarrdate as TRIP_END
,orv_dispatchsegment_id
,lms_loadparent_parentloadid
,orv_dispatchsegment_did
,orv_dispatch_site
,orv_dispatch_duration
--,orv_dispatchsegment_fromdelid
--,lms_from_customer_id
--,orv_from_customer_name
,orv_dispatchsegment_todelid
,lms_to_customer_id
,orv_to_customer_name
,tc_orv_delivery_status
,tc_lms_waybill_id
,tc_orv_delivery_skipreason
,orv_dispatchsegment_vehicleclass
,orv_dispatch_vehicletype
,orv_dispatchsegment_segmentorder
,DROP_START
,orv_dispatchsegment_departuredate AS DROP_END
,StemDistance
,CalcStemPercent
,TripKMs
,TripHrs
,TripKMs * CalcStemPercent AS DROP_KMs
,DROP_TAT
,(TripHrs - SUM(DROP_TAT) OVER (PARTITION BY orv_dispatchsegment_did) )*CalcStemPercent AS DROP_DRIVE_HRS
,NUM_PARCELS
,orv_dispatchsegment_customized
,orv_dispatchsegment_optimized
,IncludeCosting
,IncludeTheoretical
,orv_dispatchsegment_tolat
,orv_dispatchsegment_tolng
,orv_dispatch_startinglat
,orv_dispatch_startinglng
,orv_dispatch_status
,orv_dispatch_startodo
,orv_dispatch_stopodo
,(orv_dispatch_stopodo - orv_dispatch_startodo) * CalcStemPercent as DROP_KMs_ODO
,last_day(orv_dispatch_estdepdate) as TRIP_MONTH
FROM (
	 SELECT 
	 *
	,StemDistance as CalcStemDistance
	,CASE WHEN SUM(StemDistance) OVER (PARTITION BY lms_loadparent_parentloadid) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE StemDistance / SUM(StemDistance) OVER (PARTITION BY lms_loadparent_parentloadid) END as CalcStemPercent
	,CAST(orv_dispatch_distance as float) / 1000 as TripKMs
	,CAST(orv_dispatch_duration as float) /60/60 as TripHrs
	,orv_dispatch_estdepdate AS PLAN_TRIP_START --estdepdate
	,orv_dispatch_estarrdate AS PLAN_TRIP_END --orv_dispatch_estarrdate 
	,CAST(unix_timestamp(LAG(orv_dispatchsegment_arrivaldate,1) OVER (PARTITION BY orv_dispatchsegment_did ORDER BY orv_dispatchsegment_arrivaldate)) - unix_timestamp(orv_dispatchsegment_departuredate) as float)/60/60 AS DROP_TAT
	,MAX(seq) OVER (PARTITION BY  orv_dispatchsegment_did) AS Max_Seq
	 FROM drops
	 WHERE orv_dispatchsegment_todelid <> orv_dispatchsegment_fromdelid
	 --AND IncludeCosting = 1
		
) T0
WHERE last_day(orv_dispatch_estdepdate) = '""" + MonthToRun + """'
""")

display(f_drops.limit(10))
f_drops.write.mode('overwrite').partitionBy('TRIP_MONTH').parquet("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/CTS/Calculated_Tables/F_CTS_Drops.parquet/")

vw_CTS_Costs_2_TransactionsSummary_MapMonthTotals = spark.sql("""

with mappedcosts as (
    SELECT 
	   R.sap_transactionsline_acctcode
      ,R.sap_transactionsheader_postingdate
      ,R.sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
      ,R.sap_transactionsline_doccat
      ,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotal
      ,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal
      ,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo
	    ,M.Level_ID
      ,M.Group2
      ,M.Customer
      ,M.FixVarType
      ,M.UOM
      ,M.UOM_Percent
      ,M.Source
      ,M.Other
      ,M.Equipment
      ,M.Fuel
      ,M.Facilities
      ,M.NonUnionisedLabour
      ,M.UnionisedLabour
      ,M.ServiceProvider
      ,M.REVENUE
      ,M.LINEHAUL
      ,M.ChkPercent
      ,M.Comment
      ,M.CustomComment
--MAYBE CHANGE THE linetotalfinal to something else since it appears to be duplicated
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.Other * M.UOM_Percent				as COST_Other
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.Equipment * M.UOM_Percent			as COST_Equipment
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.Fuel * M.UOM_Percent					as COST_Fuel
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.Facilities * M.UOM_Percent			as COST_Facilities
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.NonUnionisedLabour * M.UOM_Percent	as COST_NonUnionisedLabour
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.UnionisedLabour * M.UOM_Percent		as COST_UnionisedLabour
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.ServiceProvider * M.UOM_Percent		as COST_ServiceProvider
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.REVENUE * M.UOM_Percent				as COST_REVENUE
,R.sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo * M.LINEHAUL * M.UOM_Percent				as COST_LINEHAUL

    FROM trans_summary R
  LEFT JOIN  dim_accountv2 A ON R.sap_transactionsline_acctcode = A.sap_account_acctcode
  LEFT JOIN DIM_CTS_I_GLMapDefault M ON 
	A.sap_account_level1name = M.Level_1_Name AND 
	A.sap_account_level2name = M.Level_2_Name AND 
	A.sap_account_level3name = M.Level_3_Name AND 
	A.sap_account_level4name = M.Level_4_Name AND 
	A.sap_account_segment_1 = M.Service_Type 
WHERE M.Level_ID is not null 
AND last_day(R.sap_transactionsheader_postingdate) = '""" + MonthToRun + """'
)

SELECT
last_day(sap_transactionsheader_postingdate) AS EO_PostingMonth
,sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
,FixVarType
,UOM
	  ,SUM(COST_Other				  ) AS COST_Other
      ,SUM(COST_Equipment			  ) AS COST_Equipment
      ,SUM(COST_Fuel				  ) AS COST_Fuel
      ,SUM(COST_Facilities		  ) AS COST_Facilities
      ,SUM(COST_NonUnionisedLabour  ) AS COST_NonUnionisedLabour
      ,SUM(COST_UnionisedLabour	  ) AS COST_UnionisedLabour
      ,SUM(COST_ServiceProvider	  ) AS COST_ServiceProvider
      ,SUM(COST_REVENUE			  ) AS COST_REVENUE
      ,SUM(COST_LINEHAUL			  ) AS COST_LINEHAUL
,last_day(sap_transactionsheader_postingdate) AS POST_MONTH
FROM mappedcosts
	WHERE Customer is null OR Customer = '' --EXCLUDING CUSTOMER SPECIFIC COSTS
    
GROUP BY last_day(sap_transactionsheader_postingdate)
,sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
,FixVarType
,UOM

""")

display(vw_CTS_Costs_2_TransactionsSummary_MapMonthTotals.limit(5))
vw_CTS_Costs_2_TransactionsSummary_MapMonthTotals.write.mode('overwrite').partitionBy('POST_MONTH').parquet("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/CTS/Calculated_Tables/vw_CTS_Costs_2_TransactionsSummary_MapMonthTotals.parquet/")

f_parcels = spark.sql("""
with ptrack as (
    SELECT lms_track_id
      ,lms_track_loadid
      ,lms_track_parcelid
	  ,P.lms_parcel_ptype
	  ,P.lms_parcel_floorstatus
	  ,P.orv_parcel_scanstatus
	  ,P.lms_parcel_parceldetailserviceid
	  ,P.lms_parcel_age
	  ,P.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid
	  --,P.lms_parcel_totcharge
	  ,P.lms_parcel_totcharge / COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY R.lms_track_parcelid) AS lms_parcel_track_linecharge
      ,lms_track_waybillid
	  ,P.lms_parcel_waybillid
	  ,DCUST.lms_customer_name
      ,R.lms_track_fromlocid
	  ,FL.lms_location_glcode AS FROM_LOC_CODE
      ,lms_track_tolocid
	  ,TL.lms_location_glcode AS TO_LOC_CODE
      ,lms_track_tracktypeid
      ,lms_track_opendt
      ,lms_track_closedt
      ,lms_track_specdel
      ,lms_track_parcelweight
      ,lms_track_parcelchargeweight
      ,lms_track_lastmilebranchflag
      ,PER.VarValue as ParcelEffort
  FROM parcel_track R
  LEFT JOIN parcel P ON R.lms_track_parcelid = P.lms_parcel_id
  LEFT JOIN waybill WBP ON P.lms_parcel_waybillid = WBP.lms_waybill_id	--joined to the waybill assigned to the parcel
  LEFT JOIN waybill WBT ON R.lms_track_waybillid = WBT.lms_waybill_id	--joined on the waybill on the track table
  LEFT JOIN location FL ON R.lms_track_fromlocid = FL.lms_location_id
  LEFT JOIN location TL ON R.lms_track_tolocid = TL.lms_location_id
  LEFT JOIN del_pickup_cust DCUST ON DCUST.lms_customer_id = P.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid
  LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM DIM_CTS_I_PARAM_Ranges WHERE RangeType = 'Parcel Weight Effort Ratio') PER ON R.lms_track_parcelchargeweight > PER.FromVal AND R.lms_track_parcelchargeweight <= PER.ToVal
    WHERE last_day(lms_track_opendt) = '""" + MonthToRun + """'
    AND (CASE WHEN FL.lms_location_locationtypeid = 6 AND P.lms_parcel_customerbarcode is null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = 1 --Fastway Exclusion
)
    


SELECT
last_day(lms_track_opendt) AS PARCELTRACK_MONTH
--,lms_track_fromlocid
,FROM_LOC_CODE
,lms_track_tracktypeid
,COUNT(*) AS NUM_TRACKS
,COUNT(DISTINCT lms_track_loadid) AS NUM_TRACK_LOADIDS
,COUNT(DISTINCT lms_track_parcelid) AS NUM_TRACK_PARCELS
,COUNT(DISTINCT lms_track_waybillid) as NUM_TRACK_WAYBILLS
,COUNT(DISTINCT lms_parcel_waybillid) as NUM_PARCEL_WAYBILLS
,SUM(lms_parcel_track_linecharge) as lms_parcel_track_linecharge
,SUM(lms_track_parcelweight) as lms_track_parcelweight
,SUM(lms_track_parcelchargeweight) as lms_track_parcelchargeweight
,SUM(ParcelEffort) AS ParcelEffort
,last_day(lms_track_opendt) AS OPENDT_MONTH
FROM ptrack
GROUP BY last_day(lms_track_opendt)
--,lms_track_fromlocid
,FROM_LOC_CODE
,lms_track_tracktypeid

""")

display(f_parcels.limit(5))
f_parcels.write.mode('overwrite').partitionBy('OPENDT_MONTH').parquet("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/CTS/Calculated_Tables/vw_CTS_Activity_ParcelTrack_Monthly.parquet/")

f_linehaul = spark.sql("""
SELECT 
T0.EOMONTH_lms_track_opendt
,T0.lms_loadchild_toloccode
,SUM(tms_booking_customerrate_perline) AS tms_booking_customerrate_perline
,COUNT(DISTINCT tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid) AS NUM_BOOKINGS
,COUNT(DISTINCT tms_booking_tripid) AS NUM_TRIPS
,T0.EOMONTH_lms_track_opendt as MONTH_PARTITION
FROM (
SELECT lms_track_id
      ,lms_track_loadid
	  ,PW.tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid
	  ,COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY PW.tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid) AS LINES_BOOKING
	  ,(CAST(B.tms_booking_customerrate as float)/10000)
		/ COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY PW.tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid) AS tms_booking_customerrate_perline
	  ,B.tms_booking_tripid
	  ,TR.tms_trip_id
      ,lms_track_parcelid
      ,lms_track_waybillid
      ,lms_track_fromlocid
	  ,LC.lms_loadchild_fromlocid
	  ,FL.lms_location_glcode AS lms_loadchild_fromloccode
      ,lms_track_tolocid
      ,LC.lms_loadchild_tolocid
	  ,TL.lms_location_glcode AS lms_loadchild_toloccode
	  ,lms_track_tracktypeid
      ,lms_track_opendt
      ,lms_track_closedt
      ,lms_track_specdel
      ,lms_track_parcelweight
      ,lms_track_parcelchargeweight
      ,lms_track_lastmilebranchflag 

    ,CASE WHEN tms_booking_tripid IS NULL THEN lms_track_parcelweight ELSE NULL END AS lms_track_parcelweight_no_tripid
    ,CASE WHEN tms_booking_tripid IS NOT NULL THEN lms_track_parcelweight ELSE NULL END AS lms_track_parcelweight_tripid
    

	  ,last_day(lms_track_opendt) AS EOMONTH_lms_track_opendt
  FROM parcel_track R --413,111,520
  LEFT JOIN parcel_weights PW ON R.lms_track_loadid = PW.tms_lmsparcelweights_loadid AND R.lms_track_parcelid = PW.tms_lmsparcelweights_parcelid --413,111,592
  LEFT JOIN stbooking B ON PW.tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid = B.tms_booking_id
  LEFT JOIN sttrip TR ON B.tms_booking_tripid = TR.tms_trip_id
  LEFT JOIN load_child LC ON R.lms_track_loadid = LC.lms_loadchild_id
  LEFT JOIN location FL ON COALESCE(LC.lms_loadchild_fromlocid,R.lms_track_fromlocid) = FL.lms_location_id
  LEFT JOIN location TL ON COALESCE(LC.lms_loadchild_tolocid,R.lms_track_tolocid) = TL.lms_location_id
  WHERE lms_track_tracktypeid = 2
  AND last_day(lms_track_opendt) =  '""" + MonthToRun + """'
  AND TL.lms_location_code IS NOT NULL
  AND (CASE WHEN FL.lms_location_locationtypeid = 6 AND P.lms_parcel_customerbarcode is null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = 1 --Fastway Exclusion
  
) T0
GROUP BY T0.EOMONTH_lms_track_opendt
,T0.lms_loadchild_toloccode

""")

display(f_linehaul.limit(10))
f_linehaul.write.mode('overwrite').partitionBy('MONTH_PARTITION').parquet("abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake Dev/CTS/Calculated_Tables/F_Linehaul_Summary.parquet/")

from notebookutils import mssparkutils

mssparkutils.notebook.exit('1_MonthTotals Notebook has run for : ' + MonthToRun)
